## Toolbox.boundEvents\_ property

Array holding info needed to unbind event handlers. Used for disposing. Ex: \[\[node, name, func\], \[node, name, func\]\].

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected boundEvents_: browserEvents.Data[];
```
